tool_description: Return Sendo Sale Product by keyword in VietNam
title: Get Sale Sendo

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: return sendo sale product by key word in VietNam
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-sale-sendo.p.rapidapi.com/sendo-api/{keyword}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-sale-sendo.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
